isis.stitle: INTERNATIONAL® VT 365 DIESEL ENGINE - CRANKCASE, CRANKSHAFT and BEARINGS, CAMSHAFT and BUSHINGS - Component Reassembly - Lower Crankcase

svcproc.title: Lower Crankcase
svcproc.para: With acceptable bearing clearance, install the lower crankcase as follows:

step1.para: Apply clean engine oil to lower bearing inserts, crankshaft journals and lower crankcase bolts.

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, make sure that the longer main cap bolts (M14 x 2 x 127) are installed inboard and the shorter bolts (M14 x 2 x 114) are installed outboard.

step1.para: Install all 20 lower crankcase main bearing mounting bolts. Tighten main cap bolts to special torque within the following sequence :

step2.para: Torque bolts to 122 N·m (90 lbf·ft) in the numerical sequence.
Torque bolts again to 163 N·m (120 lbf·ft) in the numerical sequence.
Torque bolts finally to 231 N·m (170 lbf·ft) in the numerical sequence.

figure.caption: Figure 324. Torque sequence for main bearing mounting bolts to lower crankcase

step1.para: Install eight M8 x 30 bolts around outside of lower crankcase. Tighten bolts to the standard torque using the following sequence.

figure.caption: Figure 325. Tightening sequence for lower crankcase outer bolts (standard torque)

note.para: Confirm that gear backlash between camshaft and crankshaft is within specifications.

step1.para: Check and record camshaft gear to crankshaft gear backlash as follows :

step2.para: Mount dial indicator on rear of engine.
Position dial indicator tip on a gear tooth and remove lash.

figure.caption: Figure 326. Gear backlash check (camshaft gear to crankshaft gear)

step2.para: Rotate gear by hand and read indicator. Record backlash.
If backlash exceeds specified limits , replace camshaft gear.

step1.para: Check crankshaft end play as follows:

step2.para: Mount dial indicator on crankcase with indicator tip on the end of crankshaft flange as shown.

figure.caption: Figure 327. End play check for crankshaft

step2.para: Pry crankshaft forward with pry bar and zero the dial indicator.
Pry crankshaft back and forth while reading dial indicator. Record end play.
